export const allColours = Object.keys(colours);
export const allSizes = ['28', '30', '32', '34', '36', '38', '40', '42', '44'];

export function getColorCode(colorName) {
  if (typeof colours[colorName.toLowerCase()] != 'undefined')
    return colours[colorName.toLowerCase()];

  return false;
}
